hadiths.text: Aishah narrated concerning the Ghusl of the Prophet (ﷺ) from Janabah, that he used to wash his hands and perform Wudu', then he would run (his fingers) through his (hair on his) head so that it reaches all of his hair, then he would pour water over his entire body

chapter.eng-name: The Junub Person Running His Fingers Through His (Hair On His) Head
